name: @signalk/example-anchor-watch-dotnet
description: Anchor Watch WASM plugin built with C#/.NET 10 - monitors vessel position relative to anchor
author: Signal K Team

scripts.clean: dotnet clean && rm -rf obj bin jco-output
scripts.transpile: npx @bytecodealliance/jco transpile bin/Debug/net10.0/wasi-wasm/native/AnchorWatch.wasm -o jco-output --name dotnet --map "signalk:plugin/signalk-api=./signalk-api.js" --tla-compat && node scripts/patch-jco-output.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run transpile
